projects.name: Gala: Virtual Tour Guide
projects.description: Gala VTG is a full-featured mobile application for tourists of Santa Rosa City. It has GPS navigation, an online forum, and additional features that a tourist will need! The app was created using React Native (Expo) and optimize for mobile screens.

projects.name: My porfolio website
projects.description: My portfolio website is single page application that is created with React.js and optimize for mobile and tablets. It is designed to have reusable components, which makes it easier to maintain. To change the information provided, it is easy as changing the values in the portfolio.json.

projects.name: Personal Reviewer
projects.description: Personal Reviewer is a mobile application developed with React Native Expo. It is made for my study as a student of Information Technology course. Currently, it is optimized to work on android phones with a smaller screen; to speed up the development of the program.

projects.name: Tap Tap Shop
projects.description: Tap Tap Shop is a website that I designed for our school project. It is a simple prototype that only displays static HTML pages. However, this website sources code features the use of SCSS, better usage of Javascript (avoid duplications), and good responsive design.

projects.name: A! Notes
projects.description: A! Notes is a React application. It is made for my study as a student of Information Technology course. It features downloading, loading, syntax highlighting, and responsive design. This application is created using an Android tablet with the use of DoryNode App and Quick Text Editor (Android App).

projects.name: SALP Assembly
projects.description: SALP is a simple assembly language based on a 6502 instruction set but with fewer features. It aims to introduce assembly language programming without the complexity of real assembly languages. This application is optimized with mobiles phone (as I created it with just my Android phone).

projects.name: Forum Express
projects.description: Forum Express is a backend service for the mobile application: Gala Virtual Tour Guide. It is a part of the capstone project that was created in my final year at my college course. It features a forum moderator page, REST APIs, and the use of the MongoDB database.
